original_text: Jesus replied, “Moses permitted you to divorce your wives because your hearts were hard. But it was not this way from the beginning.
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 모세가 너희 마음의 완악함 때문에 아내 버림을 허락하였거니와 본래는 그렇지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: Moses permitted you to divorce your wives
sentences.korean_translation: 모세가 너희가 아내를 이혼하는 것을 허락했다

sentences.original_text: But it was not this way from the beginning
